languages.text: Мостик — сердце пустотного корабля. Именно здесь расположен командный центр судна, посты старших офицеров и когитаторные системы управления.
The bridge is the heart of a voidship. It is where the vessel's command centre is located, as well as the senior officers' posts and the cogitator control systems.
languages.original_text: Мостик — сердце пустотного корабля. Именно здесь расположен командный центр судна, посты старших офицеров и когитаторные системы управления.

traits.locale_text: The bridge is the heart of a voidship. It is where the vessel's command centre is located, as well as the senior officers' posts and the cogitator control systems.

The bridge is the heart of a voidship. It is where the vessel's command centre is located, as well as the senior officers' posts and the cogitator control systems.

languages.text: La passerelle est le cœur d'un vaisseau spatial. C'est là que se situe son centre de commandement, ainsi que les postes des officiers supérieurs et les systèmes de contrôle des cogitateurs.
languages.original_text: The bridge is the heart of a voidship. It is where the vessel's command centre is located, as well as the senior officers' posts and the cogitator control systems.

traits.locale_text: La passerelle est le cœur névralgique d'un vaisseau spatial. C'est là que se situe son centre de commandement, ainsi que les postes des officiers supérieurs et les systèmes de contrôle des cogitateurs.

languages.text: El puente es el corazón de toda nave del vacío. Allí se encuentran el centro de mando, los puestos de los oficiales veteranos y los sistemas de control de los cogitadores.
languages.original_text: The bridge is the heart of a voidship. It is where the vessel's command centre is located, as well as the senior officers' posts and the cogitator control systems.

traits.locale_text: El puente es el corazón de toda nave del vacío. Allí se encuentran el centro de mando, los puestos de los oficiales veteranos y los sistemas de control de los cogitadores.

languages.text: ブリッジはヴォイドシップの心臓部だ。船の司令部があり、上級士官の待機場所や考算機制御システムなどが置かれている。
languages.original_text: The bridge is the heart of a voidship. It is where the vessel's command centre is located, as well as the senior officers' posts and the cogitator control systems.

traits.locale_text: ブリッジはヴォイドシップの心臓部だ。船の司令部があり、上級士官の待機場所や考算機制御システムなどが置かれている。

languages.text: 舰桥是虚空舰的心脏。这里是飞船的指挥中心，也是高级军官的办公场所与沉思者控制系统的所在之处。
languages.original_text: The bridge is the heart of a voidship. It is where the vessel's command centre is located, as well as the senior officers' posts and the cogitator control systems.

traits.locale_text: 舰桥是虚空舰的心脏。这里是飞船的指挥中心，也是高级军官的办公场所与思考器控制系统的所在之处。

languages.text: Die Brücke ist das Herz des Raumschiffs. Hier befinden sich neben der Kommandozentrale die Posten der leitenden Offiziere und die Cogitator-Kontrollsysteme.
languages.original_text: The bridge is the heart of a voidship. It is where the vessel's command centre is located, as well as the senior officers' posts and the cogitator control systems.

traits.locale_text: Die Brücke ist das Herz des Raumschiffs. Hier befinden sich neben der Kommandozentrale die Posten der leitenden Offiziere und die Cogitator-Kontrollsysteme.

languages.text: Köprü, uçsuz gemisinin kalbidir. Geminin komuta merkezinin yanı sıra kıdemli subayların görev yerleri ve kavramsayar kontrol sistemleri de burada bulunur.
languages.original_text: The bridge is the heart of a voidship. It is where the vessel's command centre is located, as well as the senior officers' posts and the cogitator control systems.
